segments.text: Our current apartment is valued at RIB 700,000 . We can sell it and put that money towards buying the new apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but we still need RIB 500,000 . Maybe we can use some of our savings to pay part of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And we can take out a loan to pay the rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , so we can afford the new apartment after all !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh huh ... but we're going to have to cut back on our shopping from now on .
segments.speaker: S1
